thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 3 of 137
thread.title: Marc Thomson

author: Marc Thomson
title: Marc Thomson
text: I have used boarding services in the past when my family and I went on vacation. They were expensive and impersonal. With DogVacay, we get to meet hosts, read reviews, and decide on what's best for our pet before we go. The price is often HALF of what a boarding service would charge. We are able to place our dog with boarders who have plenty of experience, spend time with our animal playing, cuddling, etc., and we get frequent updates, including pictures, of how our pet's stay is progressing.
